meanings.definition: The act of speaking or stating something clearly and audibly.
meanings.sent1: His enouncing of the speech captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The enouncing of the verdict was heard throughout the courtroom.
meanings.sent3: The enouncing of the rules brought clarity to the game.
meanings.sent4: Her enouncing of the poem echoed in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The enouncing of the oath marked the beginning of the ceremony.
